\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	& {K \otimes \prod N_\bullet } & {M \otimes \prod N_\bullet } & {(r_1)} \\
	{\,} & {\prod (K \otimes N_\bullet )} & {\prod (M \otimes N_\bullet )} & {(r_2)} & {\,}
	\arrow[hook, from=1-2, to=1-3]
	\arrow["\beta"', dashed, from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow["\alpha", hook, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow[hook, from=2-2, to=2-3]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
